channel.title: Help Changing Price Of Items In Points
channel.description:
Ok basically anyone know how to change the price of an item in points. Someone get back to me.
Thanks.

item.title: Help Changing Price Of Items In Points
item.dc:creator: @ZioBotic ZioBotic
item.description:
@ZioBotic wrote:

[quote=“zoomer, post:2, topic:412765”]Go to shopassistance.java

Look for:

There should be id’s of the item:

case ITEM NUMBER:
return HOW MUCH POINTS IT COST

		case 15618: < id of item
		return 100; < how much the item cost in points so 100 points

Edit - So I post a fix & they run off with it without no reply hm…[/quote]
Zoomer, help me with that?(making a dungeoneering point shop) and ill still do the dungeoneering thing for you, i figured out the point system though since we last spoke

Read full topic
item.source: Help Changing Price Of Items In Points

item.title: Help Changing Price Of Items In Points
item.dc:creator: @zoomer zoomer
item.description:
@zoomer wrote:

Go to shopassistance.java

Look for:

There should be id’s of the item:

case ITEM NUMBER:
return HOW MUCH POINTS IT COST

		case 15618: < id of item
		return 100; < how much the item cost in points so 100 points

Edit - So I post a fix & they run off with it without no reply hm…

Read full topic
